entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Percé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-d'Espoir 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -10.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -16.7°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain late in the afternoon. Blowing snow late in the morning. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
